page.title: 10Employment
page.content: Furbers is a car breaking yard, a few people are{employed}here, the main functions of this yard are to remove crashed, or cars beyond repair , and to provide facilities for members of the public to go along and remove any parts of vehicles which they need to repair their own vehicles at the fraction of the cost of buying new parts . They have people from{Newport and {Market Drayton}come to part . There are about{Two hundrerd old cars at Furbers and more come in every day. They have two{pick up trunks}. They also have a fork lift trunk and a office and the owners live next door.The yard is called Furber bros, they have a parking area which will take about{25}cars.
